title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Control humanoid robots and drones with voice and Agentic AI (DEV313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用语音和智能体AI控制人形机器人和无人机 (DEV313)
abstract: Voice control in robotics has traditionally required intricate coordination between speech recognition, natural language processing, and response generation. This session demonstrates a project developed together with the Hong Kong Institute of Information Technology (HKIIT), showing how Agentic AI and speech-to-speech streaming can simplify voice control for humanoid robots, robot dogs, and drones. The presentation explores practical AWS-based architectures designed for efficient command processing, intent recognition, and robot control systems. Through live demonstrations, learn how to minimize latency while maintaining precision across diverse environments. Discover patterns for handling continuous speech input and coordinating responsive robot behavior in real-world scenarios.
abstract_cn: 机器人语音控制传统上需要语音识别、自然语言处理和响应生成之间的复杂协调。本次会议展示了与香港信息技术学院（HKIIT）共同开发的项目，演示了代理AI和语音到语音流如何简化人形机器人、机器狗和无人机的语音控制。演示探讨了基于AWS的实用架构，专为高效命令处理、意图识别和机器人控制系统而设计。通过现场演示，了解如何在保持跨多样化环境精度的同时最小化延迟。发现处理连续语音输入和在真实场景中协调响应式机器人行为的模式。

presenter.name: Cyrus Wong
presenter.title: Senior Lecturer
presenter.company: Hong Kong Institute of Information Technology
